1. Add new features:
-Support sending Gif format emotions.
-Support adding multi-emotion collections.
-Support sending and saving emotions in personal and group chatting.

2. Update optimizations:
-Include page displaying.
-Include picture loading.
-Include picture displaying.
-Include message preloads at pulling up
-Include message preloads at opening chatting page

3. Fix bugs:
-Fix crash at making chatting muted.
-Fix some occasional crashes.
